alert.note: Alert for Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 12:30PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Valley and southeastern Adams Counties through 115 PM MDT... At 1229 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mesa, or 24 miles southwest of McCall, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. Brief heavy rains are also possible with this storm. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Indian Mountain around 1230 PM MDT. Council and Council Mountain around 1240 PM MDT. McCall, New Meadows, Meadows and Little Payette Lake around 100 PM MDT. Payette Lake, Brundage Ski Area and Lake Fork Guard Station around 110 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains
